dcterms:creator: V. Okun
A. Delaitre
P. E. Black
dcterms:description: A dataset containing C/C++ synthetic code examples (functions) with vulnerabilities from 116 different Common Weakness Enumeration (CWE) classes, originally designed to explore the performance of static and dynamic analyzers.
dcterms:title: SATE IV

dcterms:creator: S. Rajeswar
S. Subramanian
F. Dutil
C. Pal
A. Courville
dcterms:description: A dataset generated from a simple Context Free Grammar, where good data is selected randomly from sequences that satisfy the grammar, and errors are injected into each sequence.
dcterms:title: Context Free Grammar (CFG)

dcterms:description: A dataset generated for the task of sorting sequences of integers, where sequences are created by injecting errors into originally sorted sequences.
dcterms:title: Sorting Dataset

dcterms:description: A paired dataset created from SATE IV, allowing for comparison of performance between GAN and seq2seq approaches.
dcterms:title: Sate4-P (paired dataset)

dcterms:description: An unpaired dataset created from SATE IV, ensuring that a given source sequence does not have a corresponding target sequence in the training data.
dcterms:title: Sate4-U (unpaired dataset)
